TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IProcessHostPreloadClient

Docs.summary: Defines an interface that can be implemented in a type in order to preload the type in an ASP.NET application that is running on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

remarks.format:
## Remarks This interface is intended primarily for use by WCF applications that are non-HTTP applications. ASP.NET developers who want to preload ASP.NET Web applications should use the simulated HTTP requests in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] combined with the `Application_Start` method in the Global.asax file.
> [!NOTE] > The IProcessHostPreloadClient type and its methods apply only to applications that run on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Preload(string[] parameters) cil managed

Docs.param: Data to initialize the application. This parameter can be or an empty array.
Docs.summary: Provides initialization data that is required in order to preload the application.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The value of `parameters` can be `null`, a zero-length array, or a populated array.
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IProcessHostPreloadClient> type and its methods apply only to applications that run on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)].
